scripts.clean-android: cd android && rm -rf .gradle build app/build app/.cxx && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.fix-android: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run clean-android && npm run clean-android-modules
scripts.clean-build-android: npm run clean-android && npm run android
scripts.clean-ios: cd ios && rm -rf build/ DerivedData/ && xcodebuild clean && cd ..
scripts.clean-build-ios: npm run clean-ios && npm run pod-install && npm run ios
scripts.clean-cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-* && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && npx react-native start --reset-cache
scripts.clean-asyncstorage-ios: cd ios && xcrun simctl shutdown all && find ~/Library/Developer/CoreSimulator/Devices -name 'RCTAsyncLocalStorage_V1' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && cd ..
scripts.clean-simulator: xcrun simctl shutdown all && xcrun simctl erase all
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-android && npm run clean-ios && npm run clean-asyncstorage-ios
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean-all && rm -rf node_modules ios/Pods && npm install && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
